mapper.select: select goods.id, goods.name, goods.content, goods.price, goods.state, goods.typeid, goods.storeid, goods.stock, store.name as storeName from goods left join store on goods.storeid = store.id where goods.typeid = #{typeId} limit #{current} , 9
select id, name, content, price, state, typeid, storeid, stock from goods where storeid = #{storeid}
